attributes.action: Harsher disciplinary actions from teachers to deter students from smoking marijuana during school!!!
attributes.additional_details:
The number of school students who regularly smoke marijuana during school seems to be increasing.
When I walk into class, I'd appreciate it if i'm not forced to inhale the overwhelming stench of weed!

I know teachers are aware of it but they never do anything about. Why? it's because they don't have the powers to properly discipline them.
My request is that the are given the proper authority needed to stop students smoking marijuana during the school day. Simple.
